archimate:DataObject.name: Revocation Registry Entry
archimate:DataObject.documentation: In Sovrin Infrastructure, the Transaction Type written by an Issuer to update the state of a Revocation Registry. A Revocation Registry Entry may authorize newly issued Credentials or revoke previously issued Credentials.
